name: VehicleBodyType
title: Vehicle Body Type
description: Vehicle Body Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: A trailer specifically designed to transport bikes or mini-bikes.

A dump trailer that is towed individually, not as part of a trailer train.

concept.definition: A dump trailer that is part of a multi-trailer configuration.

A vehicle designed for both on-road and off-road use.
A motorcycle designed for long-distance off-road racing and riding.
A vehicle built for demanding work conditions with reinforced components.

A lightweight vehicle variant with reduced weight and features.

A vehicle optimized for high performance characteristics.

A vehicle combining trail riding capability with sport performance.
A vehicle designed primarily for work and practical applications.

A two-wheeled all-terrain vehicle.

A camper unit that can be removed from the vehicle it's mounted on.
A truck equipped to prepare and serve food.
A classic or heavily customized vehicle valued and rated based on market price.
A truck with equipment to compress and transport waste materials.

A bicycle equipped with a motor for propulsion.
